entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Timmins
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:27 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 6.0Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain or snow beginning near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 5 with temperature falling to plus 2 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow changing to snow late this evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
